meanings.definition: The state or quality of being slouchy.
meanings.sent1: Her slouchinesses made it clear she was tired and needed a break.
meanings.sent2: The room was filled with a sense of slouchinesses, as everyone lounged around lazily.
meanings.sent3: The slouchinesses of the cat lying on the couch was almost comical.
meanings.sent4: The slouchinesses of the tree branches in the wind gave them a relaxed appearance.
meanings.sent5: The slouchinesses of the old chair made it the perfect spot for an afternoon nap.

meanings.definition: The act of slouching or lounging in a lazy or relaxed manner.
meanings.sent1: His constant slouchinesses during class annoyed the teacher.
meanings.sent2: After a long day, she enjoyed the slouchinesses of sinking into her favorite armchair.
